name: Haravan
description: We are providing cloud-base omnichannel commerce and engagement marketing platform for over 50.000 SMEs, e-commerce merchants, retailers in Vietnam and South-East Asia. We help the merchants control and manage every aspect of their business in multi sale-channels with our one-stop solutions: E-commerce platform: Fast and easy website builder platform; Omnichannel retail: Multi-sales channel management platform; Social commerce Solution: All-in-one Solution for social commerce, help businesses maximize conversion rate, sales opportunities and customer engagement from social channels; Messenger Chatbot Marketing: Over 100.000 online business using our chatbot marketing platform; Facebook Messenger ads integration: maximized messenger ads performance; Inventory and Logistic management integrated; Social CRM: Social customers data platform for brands and merchants.
